v.v: You Israelite people, be glad because of what God, who created you, has done for you!
Praise Yahweh by dancing, by beating tambourines,
Yahweh is pleased with his people;
Because they have won battles, God’s people should rejoice
They should shout loudly to praise God;
ready to use them to defeat the soldiers of nations that do not worship God
They will fasten their kings and other leaders with iron chains.
They will judge and punish the people of those nations as God wrote should be done.

v: Sing a new song to Yahweh;
praise him whenever his faithful people gather together!
You people of Jerusalem, rejoice because of what God, your king, has done for you!
and by playing harps to praise him!
he honors humble people by helping them to defeat their enemies.
and sing joyfully all during the night!
but they should also hold sharp swords in their hands,
and to punish the people of those nations.
Everyone else will honor God’s faithful people for doing that!
